[i]Minerva's Sister[/i] – Nontoken creatures you control with flying have riot.
[i]Sunshine Bishop [/i]– Whenever you put one or more counters on creatures you control, you gain that much life.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Maria, Macedon Princess attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, create a 3/3 red Dragon Knight creature token with flying.
